example: The car has broken down; we can't drive.
I have lost my keys; I can't open the door.
He has forgotten her name; he can't remember.

en: We have moved to a new house.
example: We have moved; our new address is ...
The window has broken; it's dangerous.
She has finished the assignment so she is free.

en: They have arrived at the airport.
example: They have arrived at the airport, so call them.
I have cut my finger; I need a bandage.
The project has been completed and submitted.
She has sold her car so she can't drive now.
We have cleaned the house; it's tidy now.
He has broken his arm; he can't use it.
They have lost the map; they are lost.

en: I have recovered from the cold.
example: I have recovered from the cold; I feel better.
She has finished her meal; she is full.
